mapper.select: SELECT EMP_CODE, EMP_NAME, PASSWORD, POSITION_CODE, AUTHORITY_CODE, DEPT_CODE, BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE FROM EMPLOYEE
SELECT EMP_CODE, EMP_NAME, PASSWORD, POSITION_CODE, AUTHORITY_CODE, DEPT_CODE, BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_CODE=#{empCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE( EMP_CODE, EMP_NAME, COMPANY_CODE, WORKPLACE_CODE , DEPT_CODE, POSITION_CODE, SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER , BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, IMAGE , USER_PW, ZIP_CODE, BASIC_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS , LEVEL_OF_EDUCATION, USER_OR_NOT ) VALUES ( #{empCode}, #{empName}, #{companyCode}, #{workplaceCode}, #{deptCode}, #{positionCode}, #{socialSecurityNumber}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{image}, #{userPw}, #{zipCode}, #{basicAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{levelOfEducation}, #{userOrNot} )
